alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:11AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fond du Lac and northern Sheboygan Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St Anna, or 11 miles east-northeast of Fond Du Lac, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Plymouth, Howards Grove, Kohler, Elkhart Lake, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Greenbush, Mount Calvary, St. Cloud, Glenbeulah, Peebles, Haven, Johnsonville, Pipe, Calvary, Marytown, Johnsburg and Town of Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
